topic.title: How to use the MacBook Air Rentals

body.p: In order to login to the MacBook Air rental you'll need to refer to your confirmation email from AirClassroom; the 6 digit login username and 8 digit password will be sent to you there.

li.p: Login to the MacBook Air with your guest login username and password.
Open up your preferred internet browser and go to www.airclassroomVT.com
Enter your same login username and password that you used to get into the MacBook Air to get into the website.
Go to the 'save files' tab, this will automatically save any files that you create on the computer or that you bookmark on your browser to your Airclassroom profile.
